reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and explains concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson makes history come alive with engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is helpful during office hours but lectures can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is brilliant but often difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Davis challenges students to think deeply and critically.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's labs are well-organized, but lectures are a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller explains economic concepts in a very practical way.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about biology and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson provides great feedback on essays and encourages discussion.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas's lectures are informative but often lack engagement.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor connects sociological theories to real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White's enthusiasm for art is contagious.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Harris provides a lot of reading material but class discussions are insightful.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Dr. Martin uses interactive maps and tools that make the class enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson brings in guest speakers that enrich the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's course is challenging but rewarding if you put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez makes complex statistical concepts easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an excellent mentor and offers valuable career advice.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis uses case studies that are highly relevant to current industry trends.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson is very talented but the course structure is a bit disorganized.
